name: II. Data Description and Preparation
content:
Data Description:

The dataset used for this project is Historical-Product-Demands, which contains:

  • date (Temporal, daily granularity)
  • product_category (Categorical, e.g., Curtain Wall)
  • item (Categorical, specific product identifiers)
  • sales (Numerical, daily sales volume)

Key attributes:

  • Features: 4 (date, product_category, item, sales)
  • Time Period Covered: Beginning from 2014, daily granularity.
  • Variables:
  • Categorical: product_category, item
  • Temporal: date
  • Numerical: sales

Data Preparation:

The preparation process will include:

Data Cleaning:

  • Handle duplicate entries for the same date-item combination.
  • Address missing or zero sales values where appropriate.
  • Detect and treat extreme outliers caused by data entry errors.

Feature Engineering:

  • Derive time-based features (day, month, quarter, year, weekday/weekend, holiday flags).
  • Create lag features (previous day/week/month sales).
  • Generate rolling averages to capture seasonality and trends.

Data Transformation:

  • Normalize or scale sales values if required for specific algorithms.
  • Encode categorical variables (product_category, item) when necessary.
  • Split data into training, validation, and test sets ensuring temporal integrity.
